job_description: Python Developer The Dell Security & Resiliency organization manages the security risk across all aspects of Dell’s business. We are currently experiencing incredible growth in order to meet the security needs of the world’s largest technology company. With team members located in over 15 countries, you will have an excellent opportunity to influence the security culture at Dell and further develop your career. Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a Python Developer on our Product Security and Application team in Romania. What you’ll achieve We are currently seeking a Python Developer to join our Security & Resiliency team, based in Romania.  In this role, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, integrating and testing of internal applications. You will: Build applications in support of Dell’s Vulnerability Response and Vulnerability Management initiatives. Build smart connectors to ingest data from variety of data sources, including structured and unstructured data. Integrate and test automation artifacts in Gitlab or Jenkins based CI/CD pipelines. Follow Scrum process, participate in Scrum ceremonies and follow the incremental delivery model Follow the best practices for code development and code hygiene using Gitlab, and maintain documentation and user guides in Confluence Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements Python 3.9 or above Strong object-oriented programming skills Experience with HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript, jQuery, Flask, and Django, e xperience in SQL and complex database query development Knowledge of using and building Docker based deployments, experience with automation management and CI/CD orchestration with Jenkins / Gitlab CI / Ansible or equivalent Experience in distributed code repositories such as Git (Gitlab/Github/Bitbucket) Desirable Requirements Requires 5+ years of related experience in a professional role with a Bachelor’s degree; or 3+ years with a Master’s degree, or a PhD without experience; or equivalent experience. Who we are We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you. Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us. Application closing date: 15 February 2024 Dell Technologies is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment.
